episode.title: Hunt v. Washington State Apple Advertising Commission

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In the second case 76-63, Hunt, the Governor of North Carolina against the Washington State Apple Advertising Commission for reasons stated in an opinion of the Court filed this morning.
The judgment of the United States District Court for the Eastern District of North Carolina was affirmed.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
